channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Life After the Atomic Blast, as Told by Hiroshima’s Survivors
item.description: Eighty years after the dropping of the first atomic bomb, Hiroshima’s survivors and their descendants describe how health problems and stigma have ech...

item.title: Nuclear Experts Say Mixing AI and Nuclear Weapons Is Inevitable
item.description: Human judgement remains central to the launch of nuclear weapons. But experts say it’s a matter of when, not if, artificial intelligence will get bake...

item.title: Police Report: Edward ‘Big Balls’ Coristine Assaulted in Alleged Carjacking
item.description: President Donald Trump shared a photo of the DOGE staffer after the alleged attack and threatened to “federalize” Washington, DC. WIRED obtained the p...

item.title: The History and Physics of the Atomic Bomb
item.description: First came the idea of splitting the atom; then, a chain of events leading to a moment forever etched in collective memory—the use of nuclear weapons ...

item.title: OpenAI launches two ‘open’ AI reasoning models
item.description: For the first time in more than five years, OpenAI is launching a new open language model that appears to be state of the art.

item.title: Clay confirms it closed $100M round at $3.1B valuation
item.description: The AI sales automation startup raised fresh funds, led by CapitalG, just months after its last round.

item.title: US Coast Guard Report on Titan Submersible Implosion Singles Out OceanGate CEO Stockton Rush
item.description: A report on the death of five people in the Titan submersible blames design, maintenance, and inspection flaws for its failure. “It all came back to M...

item.title: Substack rival Ghost connects to the open social web with its latest public release
item.description: While the ActivityPub integration is a main selling point for Ghost 6, this major release includes a number of other changes and new additions.

item.title: For the first time, OpenAI models are available on AWS
item.description: This is a juicy competitive move for both companies after AWS faced an onslaught of criticism over its progress with AI.

item.title: Linda Yaccarino joins health tech platform eMed as CEO after leaving X
